values: 笔记本电脑；便携式电脑；手提电脑；移动计算机；轻便型电脑；个人便携电脑

word_group.brief_definition: 苹果的蛤蜊形笔记本电脑

bilingual.target: 这是台很棒的笔记本电脑。

bilingual.source: I must get a new laptop, he said.
bilingual.target: 我必须买一台新笔记本电脑，他说。

bilingual.source: You can use my laptop,' said Rania.
bilingual.target: 拉尼娅说：“你可以用我的笔记本电脑。”

bilingual.source: You can use my laptop, she told her.
bilingual.target: 你可以用我的笔记本电脑，她告诉她。

bilingual.source: My laptop isn't working. What have you done to it?
bilingual.target: 我的笔记本电脑坏了。你对它做了什么？

bilingual.source: He has got a laptop, a flat screen TV, a map and a globe.
bilingual.target: 他有一台笔记本电脑、一台平板电视、一张地图和一个地球仪。

bilingual.source: Balloon pilots navigate with a map, which is often on a laptop.
bilingual.target: 气球飞行员用地图导航，地图通常在笔记本电脑上。

bilingual.source: Adnan went into town in order to change the new mouse he bought for his laptop.
bilingual.target: 阿德南进城去换他为笔记本电脑买的新鼠标。
我可以在这里给我的笔记本电脑充电吗？
我刚买了一台华硕笔记本电脑。

list.abstract: 即笔记本电脑。根据材料和大小有多种不同数量级的重量。手提电脑和笔记本电脑两个词语常常不区分使用。下面的内容即是一段简单的对笔记本发展历史进行介绍的英语小论文。

yingyinNormal.en: Who also have copies of Zork II and Leather Goddesses of Phobos on her personal laptop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她还有《魔域2》还有《火卫一的皮衣女神》，就在她笔记本电脑上。

yingyinNormal.en: Ma, Ma, calm down. Listen to me. I know it says click with the mouse, but on a laptop, the trackpad is the mouse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 老妈，淡定，听我说，我知道上面说着用鼠标点击，但在笔记本电脑上，触控板就相当于鼠标了。

yingyinNormal.en: Got a batch of personals. Dispatching them to your laptop now. I don't mean to read, Vogel, weird German fetish e-mails.
yingyinNormal.zh: 收到一堆私人信息，正在发到你的笔记本电脑上，我可不想看，沃格尔，诡异的德国迷信电子邮件。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, if we were in India, this would be simpler. Five minutes with her dad, 20 goats and a laptop, and we'd be done.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道吗？如果在印度，这就简单多了，跟她父亲谈五分钟，20头山羊，一台笔记本电脑，一切搞定。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my goodness. Where do I begin? For instance, My laptop contained four out of the five gedanken experiments necessary for a cogent restatement of the quantum measurement problem.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天呐，多得去了，比如说，我笔记本电脑里有五种思维实验，其中四种都是关于量子测量课题的强有力的重述。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, they could monitor scientific publications and see if anyone posts such a cogent restatement in the next couple of months. If so, the authors are most likely in possession of my stolen laptop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样他们就可以监控科学出版社看看有没有其他人在未来的几个月内寄给他们这类重述，如果有，该作者就很有可能偷了我的笔记本电脑。

yingyinNormal.en: So we gave them a laptop with some pornography.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们给他们一部装有色情片的电脑。

yingyinNormal.en: Got the laptop. Hand it here. Oh, this is so exciting!
yingyinNormal.zh: 拿到电脑了。快拿过来。我的小心脏好紧张！

yingyinNormal.en: Stick that flash drive in your laptop, and you'll see I'm telling the truth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把闪存盘插到你的电脑上你就知道我讲的是真话了。

yingyinNormal.en: Gentlemen, I am now about to send a signal from this laptop through our local ISP.
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生们，我现在要通过这台电脑发射一个信号，连接到我们当地的互联网服务供应商。

yingyinNormal.en: Hang on, hang on. Do you not realize what we just did? Yeah, you turned your stereo down with you laptop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，等等，你是不是没明白我们在干什么？明白，你们用电脑把音响关小了。

yingyinNormal.en: I just knew, at the end of the day, that a woman with a glass of wine and a laptop had real shopping potential.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只知道，一天下来，一个女人拿着一瓶酒，有一个电脑，非常很想买点东西花花钱。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey. Oh, thanks again for letting me use your laptop last night. No problem. Was just doing my taxes. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗨。再一次谢谢你昨晚借我用你电脑。没事。我就是上网报个税。好。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi. Hey. What are you guys doing? We have a bunch of Bitcoin on an old laptop, and it could be worth, like, a lot of money.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好啊。你们几个干嘛呢？我们有台旧电脑里有些比特币，也许能值很多钱。

yingyinNormal.en: No, and considering you keep your laptop on your bed, right by where you change, and when you come out of the shower, and who knows what else...
yingyinNormal.zh: 不会，想想你把电脑放在床上，看得到你换衣服，看得到你洗澡出来，谁知道还能看到啥…

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps. Perhaps. Or perhaps the moment I do so, a program in that drive will seek out every device my laptop's been connected to, everyone that's close to me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许，或许，又或许我一插，盘里的程序马上就会搜索到我电脑联系过的所有装置，与我亲近的所有人。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 笔记本电脑；便携式电脑

word_family.mean: n. 顶；顶端；顶部；盖；顶盖；篷；最高的级别；最远的地方；毛条；夸克六味之一；陀螺

sense_info_list.en: a computer that is portable and suitable for use while traveling

examination_example.sentence: Now think of your <highlight>laptop</highlight>, thinner than a brown-paper envelope, or your cellphone in the palm of your hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在想想你的笔记本电脑，比牛皮纸信封或者你手掌里的手机还薄。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 笔记本电脑；便携式电脑

word_family.mean: n. 顶；顶端；顶部；盖；顶盖；篷；最高的级别；最远的地方；毛条；夸克六味之一；陀螺

sense_info_list.en: a computer that is portable and suitable for use while traveling

examination_example.sentence: This refers to all the attention young people devote to their phones, tablets and <highlight>laptops</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “屏幕时间”是指年轻人专注于他们的手机，平板电脑或是笔记本电脑。

examination_example.sentence: College professors are increasingly raisin go alarm bells about the effects smart phones, <highlight>laptops</highlight>, and tablets have on academic performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大学教授越来越多地对智能手机，笔记本电脑和平板电脑对学习成绩的影响提出警告。

examination_example.sentence: 80% of students use their phones or <highlight>laptops</highlight> during class, with the average student checking digital devices 11 times in a typical class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 80%的学生在课堂上使用他们的手机或笔记本电脑，平均每个学生在一堂课上查看他们的数字设备11次。

examination_example.sentence: The wireless age is expanding to include not just our phones, tablets, and <highlight>laptops</highlight>, but also our cars, homes, and even whole communities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的“新成员”正在进入无线时代，除了我们的手机、平板和笔记本电脑，连我们的汽车、住宅，甚至整个社区也都加入了无线的队伍。

examination_example.sentence: Suppliers over the years developed technology for <highlight>laptops</highlight>, smartphones and electric cars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 供应商多年来为笔记本电脑、智能手机和电动汽车开发新技术。
带着笔记本电脑和文件的人。

examination_example.sentence: They need to plug the <highlight>laptops</highlight> into a power outlet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们需要将笔记本电脑插入电源插座。

examination_example.sentence: As a result, many children who live in poverty (贫穷) will have their own <highlight>laptop</highlight> computers!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，许多生活贫困的孩子将拥有自己的笔记本电脑！

examination_example.sentence: The XO <highlight>Laptop</highlight> computers are made for school-aged children in developing nations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: XO笔记本电脑是为发展中国家学龄儿童制造的。

examination_example.sentence: Because of these characters the XO <highlight>laptops</highlight> make learning fun while helping the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于这些特点，XO笔记本电脑使学习变得有趣，同时帮助环境。
